name: 3rd Scopus-Indexed AIP International Conference on Inventive Research in Material Science and Technology
content: This conference will provide an outstanding international forum for students, professors and tech enthusiast from all over the world to share ideas and achievements in the theory and practice of all areas of material science. Presentations should highlight inventive systems as a concept that combines theoretical research and applications in the all areas of engineering.
organizers: RVS Technical Campus and Inventive Research Organization.
